text: Aloha! So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Who would you rather go dancing with: your significant other, your best friend or your kid (if you have one)? Honestly, I’d love to go with Connor, LOL! 2. Spa weekend or a music festival weekend? Spa weekend, 100%. 3. Have you had any eggnog this holiday season? Nope, none! I don’t really crave it, but if it’s there, I’ll have a small cup. 4. Who would you rather have lunch with: your favorite musician, your favorite actor, your favorite author or your favorite teacher? Honestly, if she was still alive, lunch with my favorite teacher from elementary would be lovely. The last time I saw her, I was 18. 5. Do you pop the zit or leave it alone? I dunno, how ripe is it? If it’s gonna slide right outta that pore, not gonna lie, I’d pop it. LOL! But otherwise leave it alone. Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen P.S. Here are the questions to copy/paste with your answers in a comment. Talk to ya soon. 1. Who would you rather go dancing with: your significant other, your best friend or your kid (if you have one)? 2. Spa weekend or a music festival weekend? 3. Have you had any eggnog this holiday season? 4. Who would you rather have lunch with: your favorite musician, your favorite actor, your favorite author or your favorite teacher? 5. Do you pop the zit or leave it alone? P.P.S. Hello from beautiful Hawaii! We’re here on Oahu visiting family this week. I’m going to try my best to relax and be in the moment. (Good luck to me, ha.) Have a wonderful and joyful week, my friend! Reader Interactions
html:
So…what is the Monday Poll?

Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007).

1. Who would you rather go dancing with: your significant other, your best friend or your kid (if you have one)?

Honestly, I’d love to go with Connor, LOL!

2. Spa weekend or a music festival weekend?

Spa weekend, 100%.

3. Have you had any eggnog this holiday season?

Nope, none! I don’t really crave it, but if it’s there, I’ll have a small cup.

4. Who would you rather have lunch with: your favorite musician, your favorite actor, your favorite author or your favorite teacher?

Honestly, if she was still alive, lunch with my favorite teacher from elementary would be lovely. The last time I saw her, I was 18.

5. Do you pop the zit or leave it alone?

I dunno, how ripe is it? If it’s gonna slide right outta that pore, not gonna lie, I’d pop it. LOL! But otherwise leave it alone.

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen

P.S. Here are the questions to copy/paste with your answers in a comment. Talk to ya soon.

1. Who would you rather go dancing with: your significant other, your best friend or your kid (if you have one)?
2. Spa weekend or a music festival weekend?
3. Have you had any eggnog this holiday season?
4. Who would you rather have lunch with: your favorite musician, your favorite actor, your favorite author or your favorite teacher?
5. Do you pop the zit or leave it alone?

P.P.S.
Hello from beautiful Hawaii! We’re here on Oahu visiting family this week. I’m going to try my best to relax and be in the moment. (Good luck to me, ha.)

Have a wonderful and joyful week, my friend!

Reader Interactions
